body.title: What is Nysos?
body.text: Nysos is a mobile application and website that operates on a ticketing system. Our project allows for the creation and promotion of events. On our website and mobile application, a user can find an event of their liking and then purchase a ticket represented by a unique QR code. The event creator can then check that attendees have valid tickets by scanning the various QR codes. Nysos targets small event structures such as student organizations. With a chat system, each event is associated with a conversation, allowing for communication of information in real-time for proper event preparation. Nysos brings together and facilitates research, creation, and communication work.

body.title: Project Production
body.text:
As part of my final year project, I developed Nysos with five other students.
The majority of development was done in our fourth year while we were all in different countries such as South Korea, United States, or me in Ireland.

Good organization and communication were necessary to develop this project.

body.title: My Role
body.text:
At Nysos, I was a mobile developer. Here is a list of the main features that I implemented:

  • A real-time, customizable chat
  • The ticketing system with payment using the Stripe service
  • The user profile and settings section
  • The community section with the ability to search using an autocomplete system, view profiles, and follow users
  • Adapting the application for IOS
